attributes.action: Give the honmeless people of London filling, nutritional and good quality food
attributes.background: The Government could create permanant Government funded canteen and restaurant for homeless people selling hot food and could create pop up food stall around the UK to give out nutritional and healthy food to homeless people since food is one of the things homeless people really need.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637327
